a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Change in mean female height over 100 years, 1896 to 1996
Change in mean female height in adults by year of birth, from 1896 to 1996. This therefore measures the change in
mean height for women who reach age 18 in 1914 versus 2014.
Data source: NCD RisC, Human Height (2017)
